RelatedSentence: Banco do Brasil Americas filed plans to open its first branch in Orlando .

The bank currently has two branches in Boca Raton , its main office on Miami 's Brickell Avenue and a branch in Pompano Beach .
It previously filed an application to open a branch in Doral .
Since entering South Florida though the acquisition of a small bank several years ago , Banco do Brasil has been growing by attracting customers from the large population of Brazilians here .
As of March 31 , the bank had $ 153 million in assets , $ 110.6 million in deposits and $ 69.1 million in loans .
Banco do Brasil Americas had enough capital to more than double in size .

Florida is the top U.S. destination for Brazilian tourists , so it makes sense that Banco do Brasil would want to be on Mickey Mouse 's doorstep .
